title: Bliss
review: It starts off stylish and confident, and then devolves into unconstrained chaos and destruction, like the life of someone going off the rails with a drug habit. If I was making this movie I would have picked something more extreme and original than a painting of a Castlevania boss, as the artwork that was driving her to insanity. It's not that crazy and you could easily come up with the idea to paint something like that without sacrificing yourself to cocaine and DMT. Maybe she should have made a sculpture of her own bodily fluids, or used the eyeballs of her victims for the eyes in the painting. If you like Mandy (the movie) and your expectations aren't too high, you may like this.
